text: IRa <5i4 TTHrfqiferabrot (Fsq 4Rdev # RTTTPf TAR4, HRGT TTGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) &qa 74d 6i-5 Vd 6, Tder-10, ERa5l, 76 @oqlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Appraisal of Projects under Bharatmala/2023 Policy Circular No.3.6.10/ 2023 dated 07th June, 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/M(PPP)/PATSCIIAC/2023 (Comp. No. 201520)} Sub: Appraisal of the Projects under Bharatmala Modifications in the constitution of Project Appraisal and Technical Scrutiny Committee (PATSC)- reg: In continuation of Policy Circular No. 3.6.9/2023 dated 28.04.2023 (copy enclosed) on above subject and in view of PIB recommendations vide OM No.24(185)/PFC-I/2021 dated 19.07.2022 on appraisal of the investment proposal for Bharatmala Pariyojana of MoRTH [Ref. Para-34(b)(xviii) , Page-38/41 of OM], a representative of office of Chief Adviser (Cost) of Dept: of Expenditure is inducted as a member in 3 PATSC Committees cited in the Policy Circular dated 28.04.2023. 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above 62|0| 22 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord:) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 2. Library for hosting the circular on library site 3 Web Admin for circulation 779 NHAL Copy
